mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS_CUSTOMER (customer_id, customer_pwd,customer_name, customer_address, customer_email, customer_tel, customer_created) VALUES (#{customer_id}, MD5(#{customer_pwd}), #{customer_name}, #{customer_address}, #{customer_email},#{customer_tel}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM USERS_CUSTOMER WHERE customer_id=#{customer_id} AND customer_pwd = MD5(#{customer_pwd})
